name: Ultimate Infinite Scroll Plugin for Posts & Woocommerce
author: Ultimate Infinite Scroll

sections.description:
The Ultimate Infinite Scroll for Woocommerce replaces the default pagination functionality of products page with ajax infinite scroll.
No need to click on pagination in order to see the next page Now, with this plugin you the whole page doesn’t need to be reloaded again.
It makes your WooCommerce store more efficient and fast, it reduces bounce date and increase engagement.

== Features ==

No more waiting for the next page: While the user scrolling the plugin will load for him the next page.

Plug and play: No need to edit any options or to make any modifications at start. Just install and enjoy.

Cross browser support: The plugin is a lightweight script which should work on any major browser (and also in mobile).

You can upload your own preloader icon: The plugin came with a default preloader icon. But you can change it with whatever you like through settings page.

Load more button: The plugin has the option to display load more button instead of load results on scroll.

Increace page speed of products page: You can choose how many products you want the server to load initially. All other products will be loaded asynchronously.

Compatibility with all themes: The plugin should work on all themes. In case you have a themed version of woocommerce you can always choose you own selectors from settings page.

Built with WordPress Best Practices: We have used the latest standards for creating this wordpress plugin in order to not affect your site performance.

== Installation ==

  1. Extract and upload the folder Ultimate Infinite Scroll to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Infinite Scroll -> Settings

Ultimate Infinite Ajax Scroll For WooCommerce

Ultimate infinite scroll and lazy load solution for your WooCommerce powered website.
sections.faq:
It’s compatible with WooCommerce?

Yes, of course. This plugin is fully compatible with latest WooCommerce version and previous versions until 2.3.

Is the ajax functionality secure?

Yes, Ajax Load more uses admin-ajax and nonces in order to protect URLs and forms from being misused.

Which browsers are supported?

  • Firefox (Mac, PC, iOS)
  • Chrome (Mac, PC, iOS, Android)
  • Safari (Mac, iOS)
  • Opera
  • Android
  • IE11+

sections.reviews:
Excellent Plugin

By Aussiesj on December 4, 2023

So simple to use straight out of the box. I installed this as a work around after an issue with my theme update. This plugin was a life saver and I highly recommend it to people who are no coders like me and just want something that works.

Simple and works fine

By Jacques-Alexandre Hallé (keroz) on May 6, 2021

I needed an infinite loading on my GeneratePress Woocommerce product page and it did the job with no code. Perfect!
